blocks.headline: TinaCMS vs Contentful: Why TinaCMS Could Be Right For You

blocks.content:
## Why Choose TinaCMS Over Contentful?

TinaCMS's open-source frontend, customizability, and visual editing capabilities make it a powerful alternative to Contentful. Here's why TinaCMS might be the perfect choice for your project:

items.headline: Visual Editing Capabilities
items.text: TinaCMS provides an unmatched visual editing experience. Our inline editing capabilities allow content creators to see their changes in real-time, enhancing the overall content creation process.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend is open-source, enabling you to benefit from community-driven improvements and regular updates. This also makes it easier to integrate TinaCMS into your existing technology stack.

items.headline: Extendable and Customizable
items.text: With TinaCMS, you can extend the CMS's functionality to suit your specific needs. Create custom field widgets, add custom validation to fields, and design a CMS that truly fits your project.

items.headline: Markdown Support
items.text: TinaCMS supports markdown content, simplifying content creation and management. This provides a straightforward and accessible method of content creation for your team.

items.headline: Git-Based Content Management
items.text: Content in TinaCMS is stored in Git, offering the best version control system available. This is beneficial for both open-source and closed-source projects.

items.headline: Great Local-Development Workflow
items.text: TinaCMS supports a seamless local development workflow. This allows you to change your schema and your content, and merge them in one commit, enhancing the developer experience.

blocks.headline: Discover the power of TinaCMS
blocks.text: Experience a new standard of content management with TinaCMS.
